LABEL: 0x2D1
STRING: 「2026―Summer, seven years ago.」

LABEL: 0x2FD
STRING: 「We were assigned an important mission by ROMLES.」

LABEL: 0x43C
STRING: Yukari began her tale.

LABEL: 0x458
STRING: Touri was by her side, with Hiragino lying down behind them.

LABEL: 0x480
STRING: Yukari wasn't concerned about their presence.

LABEL: 0x4B4
STRING: What's more, she didn't even look at me.

LABEL: 0x4F0
STRING: Her gaze drifted through the empty air as if an illusion of the distant past was floating there.

LABEL: 0x556
STRING: With a somewhat enraptured expression, she continued.

LABEL: 0x59F
STRING: 「It was an important mission. It involved exploring unknown ecosystems and energy sources.」

LABEL: 0x5F1
STRING: 「"Seek for Hidden Ecosystem and Energy Property."」

LABEL: 0x630
STRING: 「――<SHEEP> for short.」

LABEL: 0x655
STRING: 「That was the purpose and name of the project.」

LABEL: 0x69C
STRING: 「Project <SHEEP>...」

LABEL: 0x6D6
STRING: 「In response, a state-of-the-art deep-sea research vessel was built using all the technology available at the time.」

LABEL: 0x72E
STRING: 「That vessel, which bore the same name as the project, was the origin of this ship.」

LABEL: 0x786
STRING: 「It was a groundbreaking research vessel for the time, where three people could live for four days.」

LABEL: 0x7DF
STRING: In search of unknown ecosystems and energy sources...

LABEL: 0x815
STRING: ...The members were assembled.

LABEL: 0x837
STRING: A ship called <SHEEP>.

LABEL: 0x86B
STRING: 「Three main members were gathered.」

LABEL: 0x8A2
STRING: 「Those members were me, your sister, and our leader and pilot, Ryuuzen Haruki.」

LABEL: 0x90F
STRING: 「Ryuuzen?」

LABEL: 0x927
STRING: This was the first time I'd heard that name.

LABEL: 0x945
STRING: Judging by the name Haruki, he must have been a man.

LABEL: 0x98A
STRING: 「He was our specialist pilot for the deep-sea research vessel.」

LABEL: 0xA27
STRING: 「He was on good terms with your sister, too.」

LABEL: 0xA66
STRING: Yukari looked at me with a somewhat happy expression.

LABEL: 0xA92
STRING: Were they close? That was good to hear.

LABEL: 0xABE
STRING: Actually, it would be a problem if the three project members didn't get along.

LABEL: 0xB23
STRING: 「The three of us were the main members. In other words, the members who would board the <SHEEP>.」

LABEL: 0xB7C
STRING: 「I still remember it well. We started our dive on August 1st―the same time, at 14:00.」

LABEL: 0xBD3
STRING: Yukari's eyes grew more distant.

LABEL: 0xBF5
STRING: Her lips loosened into a small smile.

LABEL: 0xC2E
STRING: 「The first day of the dive...」

LABEL: 0xC4E
STRING: 「Haruki-san didn't seem to be feeling well in the morning.」

LABEL: 0xC94
STRING: 「He seemed to have had trouble sleeping for a while... but he was still acting fine.」

LABEL: 0xCEA
STRING: 「He had a cheerful personality to begin with, so he took on the role of the mood maker.」

LABEL: 0xD4E
STRING: 「He was always there to make sure that Hitose and I felt comfortable working in the dark depths of the sea...」

LABEL: 0xE16
STRING: For a moment, Yukari seemed to have a hard time choosing her words.

LABEL: 0xE57
STRING: 「...Umm, as you know, Hitose was always, well... taking things at her own pace.」

LABEL: 0xF04
STRING: 「What I mean is that there were times when we quarreled.」

LABEL: 0xF47
STRING: She lowered her eyes apologetically, or perhaps shyly.

LABEL: 0xFF5
STRING: 「We got along well, okay?」

LABEL: 0x1021
STRING: 「I didn't have many colleagues at ROMLES who were the same sex or age as me, and even if there were, we got along on a personal level...」

LABEL: 0x108F
STRING: 「B-But she got so excited when she saw marine snow right after diving.」

LABEL: 0x10E9
STRING: 「She sang, danced, cried, and even tried to use her cell phone to contact the surface...」

LABEL: 0x1152
STRING: Yukari reminisced emotionally like it had happened yesterday.

LABEL: 0x1192
STRING: She was puzzled, angry, dismayed... a realistic narrative that was mixed in just the right balance.

LABEL: 0x1256
STRING: 「Our belongings were controlled by the gram to begin with!」

LABEL: 0x129A
STRING: 「How did she manage to bring her cell phone with her?!」

LABEL: 0x133B
STRING: 「And even if she did bring it, it's not like she could get a signal down there.」

LABEL: 0x13F8
STRING: 「I remember her talking nonsense like "Why can't I get through?" and "It should connect, right?"...」

LABEL: 0x1460
STRING: 「She never knew when to quit, so it was hard to talk her out of it. It wasn't until afterward that it got bad.」

LABEL: 0x14C8
STRING: 「Just when I thought she'd calmed down after reluctantly accepting that her phone wouldn't work...」

LABEL: 0x156F
STRING: 「...She started doing quizzes about stuff I didn't really understand,

LABEL: 0x15A9
STRING: and while I had my eyes off her, she'd scribbled on the interior walls of the <SHEEP> with a permanent marker――」

LABEL: 0x165B
STRING: 「――Hah, I feel kind of sorry for badmouthing her in front of her brother.」

LABEL: 0x1698
STRING: 「Don't worry about it...」

LABEL: 0x16B6
STRING: ...I should be the one apologizing.

LABEL: 0x16E0
STRING: What had my idiot of a sister been doing?

LABEL: 0x170C
STRING: I'd thought she held her quirks in check while at work, but I guess she had behaved the same everywhere she went...

LABEL: 0x176E
STRING: In fact, I was surprised she even managed to get a job at ROMLES and was able to participate in an important project like <SHEEP>.

LABEL: 0x1849
STRING: 「Ahem...

LABEL: 0x18BD
STRING: Where were we?」

LABEL: 0x18E5
STRING: 「Right... The individual missions and tasks assigned to us and the <SHEEP> were diverse.」

LABEL: 0x1946
STRING: 「Observation and retrieval of deep-sea creatures

LABEL: 0x196E
STRING: and investigation of the dynamics of multiple gases in the deep sea...」

LABEL: 0x19AD
STRING: 「Gases?」

LABEL: 0x19D4
STRING: 「Yes. It was related to energy exploration.」

LABEL: 0x1A0C
STRING: 「Underwater oxygen gas eruptions... There's no point in telling you about each individual task.」

LABEL: 0x1A68
STRING: 「In addition to our main mission, we were also entrusted with a number of sub-missions since we were going to the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x1ADC
STRING: 「We knew that three days of hard work wouldn't be enough to accomplish all of these tasks,

LABEL: 0x1B49
STRING: but we were determined to make sure that each one, even if it wasn't perfect, would produce results.」

LABEL: 0x1BC4
STRING: Yukari spoke with an honest, if not happy and proud, expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x1C18
STRING: I was sure it was a pleasant memory for her and not just my imagination.

LABEL: 0x1C66
STRING: But in an instant, her face clouded over.

LABEL: 0x1D0E
STRING: 「However, most of the tasks weren't even touched in the end.」

LABEL: 0x1D92
STRING: 「Just as we were about to reach the bottom of the sea, the <SHEEP> collided with something.」

LABEL: 0x1E42
STRING: 「――That was unexpected, of course. I still don't know what we collided with.」

LABEL: 0x1EAC
STRING: 「Fortunately, the power system was intact, but the communication equipment was temporarily out of commission.」

LABEL: 0x1F10
STRING: 「We should have attempted to surface immediately, and our hesitation turned out to be a fatal mistake.」

LABEL: 0x1F78
STRING: 「――The high expectations ROMLES had for us, the many missions assigned to us, everything we had to accomplish...」

LABEL: 0x1FC4
STRING: 「We couldn't just leave without doing anything... That was the consensus of we reached.」

LABEL: 0x208F
STRING: They had lost communication in the deep sea――

LABEL: 0x20B3
STRING: There was no way Yukari or my sister hadn't known how dangerous it was, of course.

LABEL: 0x20F9
STRING: But they couldn't return yet... I understood how they felt.

LABEL: 0x2143
STRING: They had finally reached the deep sea... An unknown and unexplored territory.

LABEL: 0x219F
STRING: If they returned then and there, who knew when they'd get another opportunity like that.

LABEL: 0x21D7
STRING: And, if they returned because of an accident, there'd be no doubt that their next chance would be far away.

LABEL: 0x228C
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x22A4
STRING: Their decision to stay was the beginning of it all.

LABEL: 0x22D8
STRING: And I knew the end result.

LABEL: 0x2304
STRING: During that accident seven years ago, my sister――

LABEL: 0x242F
STRING: 「We continued our dive.」

LABEL: 0x2459
STRING: 「――Shortly after, we collided with something again at the bottom of the sea.」

LABEL: 0x2493
STRING: 「...I seem to recall that it was a shark... To put it simply, it "hit a bad spot."」

LABEL: 0x255A
STRING: 「The <SHEEP> was left unable to surface at all as a result.」

LABEL: 0x25B4
STRING: 「Was that――」

LABEL: 0x25D2
STRING: Communication with the surface had been cut off, and they couldn't even surface.

LABEL: 0x2606
STRING: A sunken submarine.

LABEL: 0x2624
STRING: It was just like――

LABEL: 0x2644
STRING: It was just like this accident, wasn't it?

LABEL: 0x2676
STRING: Yukari nodded.

LABEL: 0x26FA
STRING: 「And there, at the bottom of the sea...」

LABEL: 0x2720
STRING: 「...We saw it.」

LABEL: 0x27B3
STRING: 「――A light outside the windows.」

LABEL: 0x27E4
STRING: 「Light...?」

LABEL: 0x286A
STRING: 「It was a strange light, unlike any normal bioluminescence.」

LABEL: 0x28B0
STRING: 「And in the blink of an eye... that light had covered every camera the <SHEEP> had.」

LABEL: 0x290C
STRING: Light represented the existence of life.

LABEL: 0x2936
STRING: However, this light was so bizarre that even Yukari, who specialized in deep-sea exploration, called it inconceivable.

LABEL: 0x298E
STRING: Surely it was a bioluminescence of some kind.

LABEL: 0x29CA
STRING: It reminded me of a sci-fi movie I had seen long ago.

LABEL: 0x29F8
STRING: It was about a superintelligence lurking in the depths of the ocean.

LABEL: 0x2A1E
STRING: And the dialogue with them...

LABEL: 0x2A4B
STRING: 「――I don't remember who suggested going outside.」

LABEL: 0x2A91
STRING: 「Either way, our situation was dire. We couldn't communicate, and there was no guarantee we'd be saved if we waited.」

LABEL: 0x2AEB
STRING: 「In order to improve our situation, we wanted to find some clues. And――」

LABEL: 0x2B92
STRING: 「And above all, we wanted to make rational sense of that strange light covering the submarine.」

LABEL: 0x2C2A
STRING: 「Fortunately, for the sake of the mission, the <SHEEP> was loaded with pressure-resistant diving suits for the three of us.」

LABEL: 0x2C84
STRING: 「That said, we had no idea how dangerous it was to go outside. We didn't want to lose a single member.」

LABEL: 0x2CDE
STRING: 「I was originally supposed to be in charge of deep-sea exploration, so I thought I would go examine the exterior by myself...」

LABEL: 0x2DA6
STRING: 「But, just as I was about to put on my diving suit and go outside, Haruki-san stopped me.」

LABEL: 0x2E02
STRING: 「He told me that he would go since he was the leader, but his condition was getting worse.」

LABEL: 0x2E72
STRING: 「We managed to convince him to stay by saying that since Hitose and I would go, it would be fine.」

LABEL: 0x2EBF
STRING: 「And so, the two of us descended into the depths of the sea.」

LABEL: 0x2F96
STRING: Ryuuzen was in poor health.

LABEL: 0x2FB4
STRING: Their submarine was stuck at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x2FD0
STRING: The power needed for surfacing and communication had been cut off.

LABEL: 0x3010
STRING: There was a strange light outside the ship.

LABEL: 0x308D
STRING: In the midst of all that, Yukari and my sister went outside to the deep sea...

LABEL: 0x30BB
STRING: There was no way that would end well, no matter how you looked at it.

LABEL: 0x3103
STRING: However, staying inside the ship without doing anything wouldn't open the door to the future.

LABEL: 0x315C
STRING: It must have been a painful choice.

LABEL: 0x3193
STRING: 「We passed through the pressurization room, opened the hatch, and entered the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x3236
STRING: 「――It was a bizarre sight.」

LABEL: 0x32B9
STRING: 「Even though we were at the bottom of the sea, it was as bright as if the sun was shining down on us. It was like midday.」

LABEL: 0x3311
STRING: 「...Maybe "sun" is the wrong word.」

LABEL: 0x334B
STRING: 「It was as bright as if it was midday, but the colors were strange.」

LABEL: 0x33A1
STRING: 「Even now, those colors are burned into my eyes.」

LABEL: 0x33D5
STRING: 「The entire sea around the <SHEEP> was changing its color in an irregular rhythm, like it was alive.」

LABEL: 0x343C
STRING: 「Like an illusion―I was captivated by the light.」

LABEL: 0x3490
STRING: 「That was when it happened.」

LABEL: 0x350B
STRING: 「Hitose collapsed.」

LABEL: 0x3534
STRING: Wha――

LABEL: 0x3548
STRING: It was so abrupt that I was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x357E
STRING: A sudden turn of events.

LABEL: 0x359E
STRING: She collapsed?

LABEL: 0x35BE
STRING: Why――

LABEL: 0x36C6
STRING: 「Wh-What happened?」

LABEL: 0x36E8
STRING: 「Did she run into something, or was she attacked?」

LABEL: 0x371A
STRING: 「What happened to Nee-san――」

LABEL: 0x37A8
STRING: 「I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x37C6
STRING: 「I didn't notice any signs.」

LABEL: 0x3800
STRING: 「All I could tell was that she fainted while looking at that light...」

LABEL: 0x383D
STRING: Yukari shook her head.

LABEL: 0x3857
STRING: She spoke in the same tone as always, but she couldn't shake the frustration in her voice.

LABEL: 0x389B
STRING: I was approaching the truth of the past incident.

LABEL: 0x38C3
STRING: I gulped and waited for her to continue.

LABEL: 0x3902
STRING: 「I couldn't just leave her like that... but she was wearing a heavy diving suit.」

LABEL: 0x395E
STRING: 「She might be able to float underwater, but I couldn't drag her up to the <SHEEP> by myself.」

LABEL: 0x39C9
STRING: 「I was afraid to leave her behind, but I returned to the submarine to ask for Haruki-san's help.」

LABEL: 0x3A8E
STRING: 「What awaited me there... was an even more shocking sight.」

LABEL: 0x3AD4
STRING: 「Haruki-san was lying on the floor of the ship.」

LABEL: 0x3B0F
STRING: Things kept getting worse and worse.

LABEL: 0x3B35
STRING: The wheels had begun to roll toward the abyss, and they wouldn't stop anytime soon.

LABEL: 0x3B7F
STRING: The worst-case scenario I had expected was turning out to be true.

LABEL: 0x3BE0
STRING: 「――It was without a doubt the worst possible situation.」

LABEL: 0x3C16
STRING: 「I looked at Haruki-san's pallid face and saw obvious symptoms of cyanosis.」

LABEL: 0x3C70
STRING: 「I didn't have time to take off my heavy diving suit, so I administered first aid while wearing it.」

LABEL: 0x3CD0
STRING: 「But even as I did...」

LABEL: 0x3D65
STRING: 「...It was obvious that he wouldn't last long.」

LABEL: 0x3DC5
STRING: 「There was nothing else I could do, so I tried to contact the surface.」

LABEL: 0x3E0F
STRING: 「While trying to fix the communication equipment at the same time...」

LABEL: 0x3EA0
STRING: 「――It was the next morning when I managed to make contact.」

LABEL: 0x3ED6
STRING: 「But... I couldn't give them any information.」

LABEL: 0x3F18
STRING: 「There was no way to convey our abnormal situation through the disconnecting transmissions...」

LABEL: 0x3F76
STRING: 「Before long, I got cut off again.」

LABEL: 0x4035
STRING: 「――Hopelessness. That's all there was.」

LABEL: 0x4074
STRING: They made contact, but were cut off soon after.

LABEL: 0x40A8
STRING: It was another thing that overlapped with the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x40E1
STRING: The ship was enveloped in despair―and considering that, I felt like I could understand how Yukari felt at the time.

LABEL: 0x413D
STRING: But I quickly changed my mind.

LABEL: 0x416D
STRING: We had others to rely on.

LABEL: 0x4193
STRING: There were people besides just me here. Yukari, Hiragino, Touri, Tokiwa... and even Reiri.

LABEL: 0x41DB
STRING: Seven years ago on the <SHEEP>, Hitose had collapsed outside, and Ryuuzen was unconscious inside the ship.

LABEL: 0x4283
STRING: Yukari was the only one who could save them.

LABEL: 0x42B4
STRING: Only her――

LABEL: 0x43CD
STRING: 「Hitose was still unconscious outside the ship.」

LABEL: 0x43F9
STRING: 「It would have been impossible for me to carry her up the ramp by myself.」

LABEL: 0x444B
STRING: 「I barely managed to attach a cable between her diving suit and the ship.」

LABEL: 0x449E
STRING: 「She never regained consciousness through it all... and her complexion was getting worse.」

LABEL: 0x44F4
STRING: 「Haruki-san was getting paler and paler inside the ship, too.」

LABEL: 0x453A
STRING: 「I frantically tried my best to treat him.」

LABEL: 0x4564
STRING: 「I gave him the oxygen that was meant for experimentation, but――」

LABEL: 0x45FD
STRING: 「He never woke up.」

LABEL: 0x4634
STRING: At the bottom of the sea, engulfed in light.

LABEL: 0x4656
STRING: The situation was dire.

LABEL: 0x46E8
STRING: 「Eventually...」

LABEL: 0x4704
STRING: 「There was nothing more I could do for Haruki-san.」

LABEL: 0x4742
STRING: 「His condition hadn't improved at all.」

LABEL: 0x4770
STRING: 「There was nothing I could do for Hitose, either.」

LABEL: 0x47A6
STRING: 「She never woke up.」

LABEL: 0x47D2
STRING: 「There was no connection after the transmission got cut off.」

LABEL: 0x4816
STRING: 「There was nothing more I could do.」

LABEL: 0x484D
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x4869
STRING: If she didn't do anything, both of them would die.

LABEL: 0x489B
STRING: But there was nothing more she could do.

LABEL: 0x48C7
STRING: I couldn't believe she was just waiting for their―and her own―death without being allowed to do anything.

LABEL: 0x4992
STRING: How hopeless would that be?

LABEL: 0x49CB
STRING: 「All of us would die unless the <SHEEP> surfaced.」

LABEL: 0x4A0E
STRING: 「And, there was only one thing I could think of doing to make that to happen.」

LABEL: 0x4AB5
STRING: 「I went outside and searched for a rock lying on the sea floor.」

LABEL: 0x4AF9
STRING: 「I just kept pounding on the fixture holding the ballast in place with it.」

LABEL: 0x4BD0
STRING: 「I lost track of time as I did.」

LABEL: 0x4C5D
STRING: 「There was no point anyway―I knew that, but I couldn't stop.」

LABEL: 0x4D22
STRING: 「...I don't know how long I kept at it.」

LABEL: 0x4E25
STRING: 「But finally, the ballast came off.」

LABEL: 0x4E55
STRING: 「With that, the <SHEEP> began to ascend.」

LABEL: 0x4EFF
STRING: 「Hitose's body was firmly secured to the ship.」

LABEL: 0x4F39
STRING: 「I tied myself to the gently rising submarine as well.」

LABEL: 0x4F7B
STRING: 「We were finally able to escape from the depths of the sea.」

LABEL: 0x4FBC
STRING: They had escaped from the deep sea...

LABEL: 0x4FDC
STRING: The <SHEEP> had returned.

LABEL: 0x5003
STRING: The <SHEEP III>, however, wouldn't be able to surface no matter how much ballast was removed because the rear section was submerged.

LABEL: 0x5078
STRING: How were we supposed to make it back to the surface...?

LABEL: 0x512F
STRING: 「My memories of the surfacing are hazy.」

LABEL: 0x515B
STRING: 「I was so worried about the cables coming off that I didn't have time to look around.」

LABEL: 0x51BB
STRING: 「But... what's still bothering me is...」

LABEL: 0x51F1
STRING: 「While my consciousness was muddled, I thought I saw a great shadow.」

LABEL: 0x523D
STRING: 「Not a whale, but still something very large...」

LABEL: 0x5274
STRING: A giant deep-sea creature.

LABEL: 0x5292
STRING: I wondered if it was the same as the giant I saw in the wheelhouse earlier.

LABEL: 0x52E4
STRING: It was a creature that appeared in the same sea.

LABEL: 0x530A
STRING: I wasn't sure if it was the same individual, but it would be unreasonable to assume that they weren't related.

LABEL: 0x53CE
STRING: 「When we reached the surface, the dawn sky was full of stars.」

LABEL: 0x540A
STRING: 「Radio signals were usable again.」

LABEL: 0x5432
STRING: 「I entered the submarine and contacted ROMLES HQ via Hitose's cell phone.」

LABEL: 0x54D9
STRING: 「And――」

LABEL: 0x54FA
STRING: Yukari, who had been talking without pause, finally let out a sigh.

LABEL: 0x5649
STRING: 「...When I woke up, I was in a hospital room.」

LABEL: 0x5675
STRING: 「I was visited by doctors and people from ROMLES in turn, but...」

LABEL: 0x56B5
STRING: 「I was in a daze, and I could only make out bits and pieces of information.」

LABEL: 0x5760
STRING: 「Information such as...」

LABEL: 0x5780
STRING: 「That Haruki-san and Hitose were both infected with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x57C8
STRING: 「That one of them had died, and the other was still unconscious.」

LABEL: 0x5879
STRING: 「I... I lost them both...」

LABEL: 0x58DA
STRING: 「Intense emotions swirled inside me.」

LABEL: 0x590C
STRING: 「Whether they were anger, sadness, regret, or self-reproach, I didn't know...」

LABEL: 0x5952
STRING: 「Nor what I was supposed to direct them at.」

LABEL: 0x5990
STRING: 「――I have no recollection of what happened for some time after that.」

LABEL: 0x5A31
STRING: 「I was completely treated and was able to return to my work without issues, but I still don't have any memories of that time...」

LABEL: 0x5ABA
STRING: Yukari went quiet.

LABEL: 0x5AE0
STRING: Silence fell between us.

LABEL: 0x5AFA
STRING: The truth of the accident seven years ago.

LABEL: 0x5B1B
STRING: A tragedy never told and sealed away, known only by few people among ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x5B75
STRING: A truth that was never told, even to the victims' families.

LABEL: 0x5BB5
STRING: It was not merely a memory of a deep-sea exploration that had produced victims, but also a memory of a chance encounter with <Alice> and an unknown light.

LABEL: 0x5C1D
STRING: Yukari hung her head and started talking again.

LABEL: 0x5CC5
STRING: 「Hitose... your sister died.」

LABEL: 0x5D01
STRING: 「Haruki-san is still asleep in the hospital, infected with <Alice>.」

LABEL: 0x5D4D
STRING: 「Various interconnected events led to the worst outcome...」

LABEL: 0x5DF2
STRING: 「But, <Alice> was the beginning of it all.」

LABEL: 0x5E32
STRING: 「Even the accident on the first day could've been avoided if Haruki-san hadn't been infected with <Alice> and stayed healthy.」

LABEL: 0x5EFB
STRING: 「It was all because of <Alice>...」

LABEL: 0x5F2A
STRING: That was where Yukari's hatred stemmed from.

LABEL: 0x5F48
STRING: That accident of the past was a formative experience for her when it came to her excessive fear and hatred of it.

LABEL: 0x5FAC
STRING: But what shocked me was something else in her story.

LABEL: 0x6079
STRING: ――My sister's final moments.

LABEL: 0x6099
STRING: She had been infected with <Alice> at the bottom of the sea, had fallen asleep, and had never woken up again.

LABEL: 0x614E
STRING: ――Had she died in this sea?

LABEL: 0x617E
STRING: At the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x6198
STRING: The sea she had loved so much.

LABEL: 0x62BF
STRING: 「...I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x62DF
STRING: 「My hatred of <Alice> is just an excuse. You could say I'm shifting the blame.」

LABEL: 0x6333
STRING: 「...In the end, I survived.」

LABEL: 0x6369
STRING: 「If I had done better, I might have saved your sister.」

LABEL: 0x63F2
STRING: She survived, and――

LABEL: 0x641A
STRING: As if to stifle her own emotions...

LABEL: 0x643E
STRING: She cried in a trembling voice.

LABEL: 0x6466
STRING: Yukari wiped her eyes, her whole body shaking.

LABEL: 0x64A0
STRING: Her eyes were faintly red when she looked up, and there was a single mark on the back of her hand.

LABEL: 0x655E
STRING: 「Sorry... I lost my composure.」

LABEL: 0x658C
STRING: 「...That's everything I know about the accident seven years ago.」

LABEL: 0x65C0
STRING: 「I've never told this to you either, have I, Hiragino-sensei?」

LABEL: 0x662C
STRING: Hiragino, who had been silent as if asleep, slowly got up.

LABEL: 0x666E
STRING: He stared at Yukari with a serious look that could be mistaken for anger.

LABEL: 0x67A1
STRING: 「Thank you for telling us, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x682C
STRING: 「And... sorry.」

LABEL: 0x685F
STRING: 「I don't know what you're apologizing for, but...」

LABEL: 0x68EE
STRING: 「I'm used to your rudeness by now. There's no need to apologize.」

LABEL: 0x693B
STRING: Yukari smiled at Hiragino, then looked back at me calmly.

LABEL: 0x6A07
STRING: 「...There was one thing I wanted to tell you.」

LABEL: 0x6A47
STRING: 「When I used Hitose's phone to contact ROMLES,

LABEL: 0x6A81
STRING: the photo folder was open.」

LABEL: 0x6ABF
STRING: 「There was a picture of a young man there...」

LABEL: 0x6AF9
STRING: 「I felt like it wasn't something I was supposed to see, so I closed it right away, but...」

LABEL: 0x6BAE
STRING: 「Thinking back, that was a picture of you, wasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x6BF9
STRING: 「...Of me?」

LABEL: 0x6C26
STRING: 「I think I'd recognize your face if we passed each other on the street.」

LABEL: 0x6C5E
STRING: 「...I'm sure Hitose went to reckless lengths in order to take your picture with her.」

LABEL: 0x6CE7
STRING: ...She really was an idiot.

LABEL: 0x6D0B
STRING: Going so far to break the rules for something like that,

LABEL: 0x6D3D
STRING: right until the very end...

LABEL: 0x6DEA
STRING: I couldn't get her smile out of my head.

LABEL: 0x6E12
STRING: My sister had yearned for, had been enthralled by, and had disappeared into the sea.

LABEL: 0x6EC7
STRING: The people from ROMLES who had visited me seven years ago, the day after the accident, hadn't told me anything.

LABEL: 0x6F0B
STRING: They just said she had died in an accident during a mission.

LABEL: 0x6F4D
STRING: These seven years, I've lived my life trying to learn as much as possible about my sister's death...

LABEL: 0x6F91
STRING: This plan had been for that reason as well. To obtain the truth of seven years past.

LABEL: 0x7028
STRING: But enough was enough.

LABEL: 0x704C
STRING: Yukari's words have made everything clear.

LABEL: 0x707C
STRING: In the end,

LABEL: 0x7092
STRING: she really did die in this sea――

LABEL: 0x71C5
STRING: 「...Thank you.」

LABEL: 0x71E5
STRING: 「My sister loved the sea, as I'm sure you know... Abnormally so.」

LABEL: 0x7237
STRING: 「I know it sounds inappropriate, but... she must have felt satisfied dying there.」

LABEL: 0x72BB
STRING: 「But... we can't follow her.」

LABEL: 0x7315
STRING: The sea was where she died.

LABEL: 0x7335
STRING: The sea killed my sister.

LABEL: 0x7355
STRING: Our situation had worsened the same way it had for those three seven years ago, and had made us suffer as it had back then.

LABEL: 0x7425
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x743D
STRING: This wasn't the same as seven years ago.

LABEL: 0x7465
STRING: The same tragedy would not repeat itself.

LABEL: 0x7493
STRING: 「We will... survive.」
